headline: How DLocal’s More Independent Board and New Committees Could Impact DLocal (DLO) Investors
summary: DLocal has completed its transition to a nine-person, majority independent Board of Directors, adding former Citi executive Paco Ybarra and ex-Google and IBM leader Nelson Mattos, while also forming new governance, compensation, and product and technology committees. The shift of co-founder Sergio Fogel into a non-executive strategic advisory role signals a clearer separation between management and oversight, potentially reshaping how DLocal balances growth initiatives with risk...
